Content

Hello there :)
This first layout version of santuwaryo.net features japanese rock artist miyavi. Let's just get this out the way now. I love this guy. &heart; This layout has been coded in firefox. Has been tested in firefox, IE, Safari. Main navigation is to the right. But I couldn't have designed this layout all on my own, without the wonderful resources found in my credit's page.

If you have any questions or comments, feel free to contact me!underline
